system.description:
Benefit

The character can fire any black powder firearm without penalty.

Normal

Characters without this feat take a -4 penalty on attack rolls made with black powder firearms and can not reload them

Special

The Personal Firearm Proficiency Feat allows you to fire black powder weapons without penalty, but not to reload them.

Tutoring

Time: 1 Day

Benefit: Can reload black powder firearms and attack penalty is reduced to -3
system.summary: Use and reload black powder firearms without penalty.
